submission:
from typing import List

class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        count = 0
        start = 0
        end = 1
        num_groups = 0
        
        while end < len(arr) + k and start < len(arr):
            temp_end = end
            temp_end_index = temp_end % len(arr)
            
            while arr[temp_end_index] != arr[temp_end_index - 1] and (temp_end < (len(arr) + k - 1)):
                temp_end += 1
                temp_end_index = temp_end % len(arr)

            num_groups += max(temp_end - start - k + 1, 0)
            start = temp_end
            end = start + 1
        
        return num_groups
